title: Bad Blocks from geth
body:
I'm trying to initialize my ethereum install. It started to download the blockchain, but then I thought it stopped (maybe it didn't?) so I pressed Ctrl-C. It looks like it said it did a clean shutdown. Then when I restart it, I get this over and over.
(I'm starting it by just typing "geth")

```
I0619 18:24:42.394181    7967 chain_manager.go:801] Bad block #622455 (3f73c56882c9b071b2a0a6bd106c6a7f2861e9852107d9d692445bb5c4d31f94)
I0619 18:24:42.394242    7967 chain_manager.go:802] invalid receipt root hash. received=43074b545349d39af35c61facd37ad81fd38ce5f0ae661c20ec29e1134496b53 calculated=09b99b32f6c24e09be765589c0aeea5eb6150f295f48f710007a8c334c4976c3
I0619 18:24:42.394344    7967 downloader.go:224] Synchronisation failed: block downloading canceled (requested)
I0619 18:25:38.253398    7967 chain_manager.go:801] Bad block #622455 (3f73c56882c9b071b2a0a6bd106c6a7f2861e9852107d9d692445bb5c4d31f94)
I0619 18:25:38.253457    7967 chain_manager.go:802] invalid receipt root hash. received=43074b545349d39af35c61facd37ad81fd38ce5f0ae661c20ec29e1134496b53 calculated=09b99b32f6c24e09be765589c0aeea5eb6150f295f48f710007a8c334c4976c3
I0619 18:25:38.253549    7967 downloader.go:224] Synchronisation failed: block downloading canceled (requested)
I0619 18:25:49.900579    7967 chain_manager.go:801] Bad block #622455 (3f73c56882c9b071b2a0a6bd106c6a7f2861e9852107d9d692445bb5c4d31f94)
I0619 18:25:49.900624    7967 chain_manager.go:802] invalid receipt root hash. received=43074b545349d39af35c61facd37ad81fd38ce5f0ae661c20ec29e1134496b53 calculated=09b99b32f6c24e09be765589c0aeea5eb6150f295f48f710007a8c334c4976c3
I0619 18:25:49.900688    7967 downloader.go:224] Synchronisation failed: block downloading canceled (requested)
I0619 18:25:54.218740    7967 chain_manager.go:801] Bad block #622455 (3f73c56882c9b071b2a0a6bd106c6a7f2861e9852107d9d692445bb5c4d31f94)
I0619 18:25:54.218799    7967 chain_manager.go:802] invalid receipt root hash. received=43074b545349d39af35c61facd37ad81fd38ce5f0ae661c20ec29e1134496b53 calculated=09b99b32f6c24e09be765589c0aeea5eb6150f295f48f710007a8c334c4976c3
I0619 18:25:54.218906    7967 downloader.go:224] Synchronisation failed: block downloading canceled (requested)

(repeats over and over)
```

```
$ uname -a
Linux hostname-generic #64-Ubuntu SMP Mon Sep 22 21:28:38 UTC 2014 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
$ lsb_release -a
No LSB modules are available.
Distributor ID: Ubuntu
Description:    Ubuntu 14.04.2 LTS
Release:        14.04
Codename:       trusty
```

```
$ sudo dpkg -l | grep -i ethereum
ii  bootnode                                0.9.31+619SNAPSHOT20150619165934trusty-0ubuntu1 amd64        Ethereum bootnode.
ii  console                                 0.9.31+619SNAPSHOT20150619165934trusty-0ubuntu1 amd64        Ethereum console.
ii  disasm                                  0.9.31+619SNAPSHOT20150619165934trusty-0ubuntu1 amd64        Ethereum disasm tool.
ii  ethereum                                0.9.31+619SNAPSHOT20150619165934trusty-0ubuntu1 amd64        Meta-package to install ethereum (CLI) and mist (GUI)
ii  ethtest                                 0.9.31+619SNAPSHOT20150619165934trusty-0ubuntu1 amd64        Ethereum ethtest tool.
ii  evm                                     0.9.31+619SNAPSHOT20150619165934trusty-0ubuntu1 amd64        Ethereum evm tool.
ii  geth                                    0.9.31+619SNAPSHOT20150619165934trusty-0ubuntu1 amd64        Ethereum CLI client.
ii  mist                                    0.9.31+619SNAPSHOT20150619165934trusty-0ubuntu1 amd64        Mist browser, official Ethereum GUI client.
ii  rlpdump                                 0.9.31+619SNAPSHOT20150619165934trusty-0ubuntu1 amd64        Ethereum rlpdump tool.
```

```
/etc/apt/sources.list.d$ cat *
deb http://ppa.launchpad.net/ethereum/ethereum-dev/ubuntu trusty main
# deb-src http://ppa.launchpad.net/ethereum/ethereum-dev/ubuntu trusty main
deb http://ppa.launchpad.net/ethereum/ethereum-qt/ubuntu trusty main
# deb-src http://ppa.launchpad.net/ethereum/ethereum-qt/ubuntu trusty main
deb http://ppa.launchpad.net/ethereum/ethereum-qt/ubuntu trusty main
# deb-src http://ppa.launchpad.net/ethereum/ethereum-qt/ubuntu trusty main
deb http://ppa.launchpad.net/ethereum/ethereum/ubuntu trusty main
# deb-src http://ppa.launchpad.net/ethereum/ethereum/ubuntu trusty main
deb http://ppa.launchpad.net/ethereum/ethereum/ubuntu trusty main
# deb-src http://ppa.launchpad.net/ethereum/ethereum/ubuntu trusty main
```
(Also, I don't understand this page: https://github.com/ethereum/wiki/wiki/Bad-Block-Reporting  and the domain it mentions, badblocks.ethdev.com seems to be invalid.)
Why the fuck does everybody close these without providing a solution?
